Issue.creator: smithbk
Issue.summary: base 64 decoding in auth header should handle padding
Issue.description: The B64Decode function in fabric-ca/util/util.go uses RawStdEncoding which doesn't handle padding. It should use StdEncoding so it handles padding. I'm not sure if StdEncoding also handles w/o padding, so it may be safer to try StdEncoding 1st and if it fails, try RawStdEncoding.
